revisions.rev:
{{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} {{Elections| image=| caption=}} This '''electoral calendar 2009''' lists the national/federal direct elections held in 2009 in the de jure and de facto [[list of sovereign states|sovereign states]] and their [[list of dependent territories|dependent territories]]. [[Referendum]]s are included, although they are not elections. [[By-elections]] are not included.
==January== * 12 January: [[Elections in Malta|Malta]], [[Maltese presidential election, 2009|President]] (by the parliament) * 18 January: [[Elections in El Salvador|El Salvador]], [[Salvadoran legislative election, 2009|Parliament]] * 25 January: [[Elections in Bolivia|Bolivia]], [[Bolivian constitutional referendum, 2009|Constitutional referendum]] * 30 January: [[Elections in Somalia|Somalia]], [[Somali presidential election, 2009|President]] (by the parliament) * 31 January: [[Elections in Iraq|Iraq]], [[Iraqi governorate elections, 2009|Governorate Councils]]
==February== * 8 February: [[Elections in Turkmenistan|Turkmenistan]], [[Turkmenistani parliamentary election, 2008â2009|Parliament ({{ordinal|3}} Round)]] * 8 February: [[Elections in Liechtenstein|Liechtenstein]], [[Liechtenstein parliamentary election, 2009|Parliament]] * 8 February: [[Elections in Switzerland|Switzerland]], [[Swiss referendum, February 2009|Referendum on freedom of movement within the European Union]] * 10 February: [[Elections in Israel|Israel]], [[Israeli legislative election, 2009|Parliament]] * 12 February: [[Elections in French Polynesia|French Polynesia]], [[French Polynesian presidential election, 2009|President]] (by the parliament) * 15 February: [[Elections in Venezuela|Venezuela]], [[Venezuelan constitutional referendum, 2009|Constitutional referendum]]
==March== * 3 March: [[Elections in Micronesia|Federated States of Micronesia]], [[Micronesian parliamentary election, 2009|Parliament]] * 8 March: [[Elections in North Korea|North Korea]], [[North Korean parliamentary election, 2009|Parliament]] * 12 March: [[Elections in Antigua and Barbuda|Antigua and Barbuda]], [[Antigua and Barbuda general election, 2009|Parliament]] * 15 March: [[Elections in El Salvador|El Salvador]], [[Salvadoran presidential election, 2009|President]] * 18 March: [[Elections in Azerbaijan|Azerbaijan]], [[Azerbaijani constitutional referendum, 2009|Constitutional referendum]] * 21 March: [[Elections in Slovakia|Slovakia]], [[Slovak presidential election, 2009|President ({{ordinal|1}} Round)]] * 22 March: [[Elections in the Republic of Macedonia|Macedonia]], [[Macedonian presidential election, 2009|President ({{ordinal|1}} Round)]] * 29 March: [[Elections in Montenegro|Montenegro]], [[Montenegrin parliamentary election, 2009|Parliament]] * 29 March: [[Elections in Mayotte|Mayotte]], [[Mahoran status referendum, 2009|Status referendum]]
==April== * 4 April: [[Elections in Slovakia|Slovakia]], [[Slovak presidential election, 2009|President ({{ordinal|2}} Round)]] * 5 April: [[Elections in the Republic of Macedonia|Macedonia]], [[Macedonian presidential election, 2009|President ({{ordinal|2}} Round)]] * 5 April: [[Elections in Moldova|Moldova]], [[Moldovan parliamentary election, April 2009|Parliament]] * 9 April: [[Elections in Algeria|Algeria]], [[Algerian presidential election, 2009|President]] * 9 April: [[Elections in Indonesia|Indonesia]], [[Indonesian legislative election, 2009|Parliament]] * 16 April: [[Elections in India|India]], [[Indian general election, 2009|Parliament ({{ordinal|1}} Round)]] * 19 April: [[Elections in Haiti|Haiti]], [[Haitian Senate election, 2009|Senate ({{ordinal|1}} Round)]] (12 of 30 seats) * 19 April: [[Elections in Northern Cyprus|Northern Cyprus]], [[Northern Cyprus parliamentary election, 2009|Parliament]] * 22 April: [[Elections in South Africa|South Africa]], [[South African general election, 2009|Parliament]] * 23 April: [[Elections in India|India]], [[Indian general election, 2009|Parliament ({{ordinal|2}} Round)]] * 25 April: [[Elections in Iceland|Iceland]], [[Icelandic parliamentary election, 2009|Parliament]] * 26 April: [[Elections in Andorra|Andorra]], [[Andorran parliamentary election, 2009|Parliament]] * 26 April: [[Elections in Ecuador|Ecuador]], [[Ecuadorian general election, 2009|President and Parliament]] * 30 April: [[Elections in India|India]], [[Indian general election, 2009|Parliament ({{ordinal|3}} Round)]]
==May== * 3 May: [[Elections in Panama|Panama]], [[Panamanian general election, 2009|President and Parliament]] * 6 May: [[Elections in South Africa|South Africa]], [[South African presidential election, 2009|President]] (by the parliament) * 7 May: [[Elections in India|India]], [[Indian general election, 2009|Parliament ({{ordinal|4}} Round)]] * 9 May: [[Elections in the Maldives|Maldives]], [[Maldivian parliamentary election, 2009|Parliament]] * 10 May: [[Elections in New Caledonia|New Caledonia]], [[New Caledonian legislative election, 2009|Parliament]] * 13 May: [[Elections in India|India]], [[Indian general election, 2009|Parliament ({{ordinal|5}} Round)]] * 16 May: [[Elections in Kuwait|Kuwait]], [[Kuwaiti parliamentary election, 2009|Parliament]] * 17 May: [[Elections in Lithuania|Lithuania]], [[Lithuanian presidential election, 2009|President]] * 17 May: [[Elections in Switzerland|Switzerland]], [[Swiss referendum, May 2009|Referendum]] * 17 May: [[Elections in Comoros|Comoros]], [[Comorian constitutional referendum, 2009|Constitutional referendum]] * 19 May: [[Elections in Malawi|Malawi]], [[Malawian general election, 2009|President and Parliament]] * 20 May: [[Elections in the Cayman Islands|Cayman Islands]], [[Caymanian general election, 2009|Parliament]] and [[Caymanian constitutional referendum, 2009|constitutional referendum]] * 20 May: [[Elections in Moldova|Moldova]], [[Moldovan presidential election, MayâJune 2009|President ({{ordinal|1}} Round)]] (indirect) * 23 May: [[Elections in Germany|Germany]], [[German presidential election, 2009|President]] (indirect) * 24 May: [[Elections in Mongolia|Mongolia]], [[Mongolian presidential election, 2009|President]] * 31 May: [[Politics of South Ossetia|South Ossetia]], [[South Ossetian parliamentary election, 2009|Parliament]]
==June== * 2 June: [[Elections in Greenland|Greenland]], [[Greenlandic parliamentary election, 2009|Parliament]] * 3 June: [[Elections in Moldova|Moldova]], [[Moldovan presidential election, MayâJune 2009|President ({{ordinal|2}} Round)]] (indirect) * 4â7 June: [[Elections in the European Union|European Union]], [[European Parliament election, 2009|European Parliament]] * 7 June: [[Elections in Denmark|Denmark]], [[Danish Act of Succession referendum, 2009|Act of Succession referendum]] * 7 June: [[Elections in Luxembourg|Luxembourg]], [[Luxembourgish legislative election, 2009|Parliament]] * 7 June: [[Elections in Lebanon|Lebanon]], [[Lebanese general election, 2009|Parliament]] * 12 June: [[Elections in Iran|Iran]], [[Iranian presidential election, 2009|President]] * 21 June: [[Elections in Haiti|Haiti]], [[Haitian Senate election, 2009|Senate ({{ordinal|2}} Round)]] (12 of 30 seats) * 21â22 June: [[Elections in Italy|Italy]], [[Italian electoral law referendum, 2009|Electoral law referendum]] * 28 June: [[Elections in Albania|Albania]], [[Albanian parliamentary election, 2009|Parliament]] * 28 June: [[Elections in Argentina|Argentina]], [[Argentine legislative election, 2009|Legislative]] * 28 June: [[Elections in Guinea-Bissau|Guinea-Bissau]], [[Guinea-Bissau presidential election, 2009|President ({{ordinal|1}} Round)]]
==July== * 5 July: [[Elections in Bulgaria|Bulgaria]], [[Bulgarian parliamentary election, 2009|Parliament]] * 5 July: [[Elections in Mexico|Mexico]], [[Mexican legislative election, 2009|Legislative]] * 8 July: [[Elections in Indonesia|Indonesia]], [[Indonesian presidential election, 2009|President]] * 12 July: [[Elections in the Republic of the Congo|Republic of the Congo]], [[Republic of the Congo presidential election, 2009|President]] * 18 July: [[Elections in Mauritania|Mauritania]], [[Mauritanian presidential election, 2009|President]] * 23 July: [[Elections in Kyrgyzstan|Kyrgyzstan]], [[Kyrgyzstani presidential election, 2009|President]] * 25 July: [[Iraqi Kurdistan]], [[Iraqi Kurdistan legislative election, 2009|Parliament]] and [[Iraqi Kurdistan presidential election, 2009|President]] * 26 July: [[Elections in Guinea-Bissau|Guinea-Bissau]], [[Guinea-Bissau presidential election, 2009|President ({{ordinal|2}} Round)]] * 29 July: [[Elections in Moldova|Moldova]], [[Moldovan parliamentary election, July 2009|Parliament]] * 31 July â 21 August<!-- this means UNTIL 21 August, because it's a postal vote -- do NOT remove the dash-->: [[Elections in New Zealand|New Zealand]], [[New Zealand corporal punishment referendum, 2009|Referendum]]
==August== * 4 August: [[Elections in Niger|Niger]], [[Nigerien constitutional referendum, 2009|Constitutional referendum]] * 20 August: [[Elections in Afghanistan|Afghanistan]], [[Afghan presidential election, 2009|President]] * 30 August: [[Elections in Gabon|Gabon]], [[Gabonese presidential election, 2009|President]] * 30 August: [[Elections in Japan|Japan]], [[Japanese general election, 2009|Parliament]]
==September== * 1â2 September: [[Elections in Vanuatu|Vanuatu]], [[Vanuatu presidential election, 2009|President]] (indirect) * 8 September: [[Elections in Montserrat|Montserrat]], [[Montserratian general election, 2009|Parliament]] * 12 September [[Elections in Turkey|Turkey]], [[Constitution Referendum]] * 14 September: [[Elections in Norway|Norway]], [[Norwegian parliamentary election, 2009|Parliament]] * 16 September: [[Elections in Switzerland|Switzerland]], [[Swiss Federal Council election, 2009|Federal Council]] (indirect) * 20 September: [[Elections in Macau|Macau]], [[Macanese legislative election, 2009|Legislative]] * 25 September: [[Elections in Aruba|Aruba]], [[Aruban general election, 2009|Parliament]] * 27 September: [[Elections in Germany|Germany]], [[German federal election, 2009|Parliament]] * 27 September: [[Elections in Portugal|Portugal]], [[Portuguese legislative election, 2009|Parliament]] * 27 September: [[Elections in Switzerland|Switzerland]], [[Swiss referendum, September 2009|Referendum]]
==October== * 2 October: [[Elections in Ireland|Republic of Ireland]], [[Twenty-eighth Amendment of the Constitution of Ireland|Treaty of Lisbon referendum]] * 4 October: [[Elections in Greece|Greece]], [[Greek legislative election, 2009|Parliament]] * 16 October: [[Elections in Botswana|Botswana]], [[Botswana general election, 2009|Parliament]] * 20 October: [[Elections in Niger|Niger]], [[Nigerien parliamentary election, 2009|Parliament]] * 25 October: [[Elections in Tunisia|Tunisia]], [[Tunisian general election, 2009|President and Parliament]] * 25 October: [[Elections in Uruguay|Uruguay]], [[Uruguayan general election, 2009|President ({{ordinal|1}} Round), Parliament and Referendum]] * 26 October: [[Elections in the Marshall Islands|Marshall Islands]], [[Marshall Islands presidential election, 2009|President]] (indirect) * 28 October: [[Elections in Mozambique|Mozambique]], [[Mozambican general election, 2009|President and Parliament]]
==November== * 5 November: [[Elections in the Falkland Islands|Falkland Islands]], [[Falkland Islands general election, 2009|General]] * 7 November: [[Elections in the Northern Mariana Islands|Northern Mariana Islands]], [[Northern Mariana Islands gubernatorial election, 2009|Governor]] ({{ordinal|1}} Round) and [[Northern Mariana Islands legislative election, 2009|Legislative]] * 10 November: [[Elections in Moldova|Moldova]], [[Moldovan presidential election, November 2009|President ({{ordinal|1}} Round)]] (indirect) * 22 November: [[Elections in Romania|Romania]], [[Romanian presidential election, 2009|President ({{ordinal|1}} Round)]] and [[Romanian constitutional referendum, 2009|Referendum]] * 23 November: [[Elections in the Northern Mariana Islands|Northern Mariana Islands]], [[Northern Mariana Islands gubernatorial election, 2009|Governor]] ({{ordinal|2}} Round) * 25 November: [[Elections in Saint Vincent and the Grenadines|Saint Vincent and the Grenadines]], [[Saint Vincent and the Grenadines constitutional referendum, 2009|Constitutional referendum]] * 27â28 November: [[Elections in Namibia|Namibia]], [[Namibian general election, 2009|President and Parliament]] * 29 November: [[Elections in Equatorial Guinea|Equatorial Guinea]], [[Equatorial Guinean presidential election, 2009|President]] * 29 November: [[Elections in Honduras|Honduras]], [[Honduran general election, 2009|President and Parliament]] * 29 November: [[Elections in Switzerland|Switzerland]], [[Swiss referendum, November 2009|Referendum]] * 29 November: [[Elections in Uruguay|Uruguay]], [[Uruguayan general election, 2009|President ({{ordinal|2}} Round)]]
==December== * 6 December: [[Elections in Bolivia|Bolivia]], [[Bolivian general election, 2009|President and Parliament]] * 6 December: [[Elections in Comoros|Comoros]], [[Comorian legislative election, 2009|Parliament ({{ordinal|1}} Round)]] * 6 December: [[Elections in Romania|Romania]], [[Romanian presidential election, 2009|President ({{ordinal|2}} Round)]] * 7 December: [[Elections in Moldova|Moldova]], [[Moldovan presidential election, November 2009|President ({{ordinal|2}} Round)]] (indirect) * 12 December: [[Elections in Abkhazia|Abkhazia]], [[Abkhazian presidential election, 2009|President]] * 13 December: [[Elections in Chile|Chile]], [[Chilean presidential election, 2009â2010|President ({{ordinal|1}} Round)]] and [[Chilean parliamentary election, 2009|Parliament]] * 18 December: [[Elections in Dominica|Dominica]], [[Dominican general election, 2009|Parliament]] * 20 December: [[Elections in Comoros|Comoros]], [[Comorian legislative election, 2009|Parliament ({{ordinal|2}} round)]] * 27 December: [[Elections in Uzbekistan|Uzbekistan]], [[Uzbekistani parliamentary election, 2009|Parliament]] * 27 December: [[Elections in Croatia|Croatia]], [[Croatian presidential election, 2009â2010|President ({{ordinal|1}} Round)]]
